body: I've tested this for OpenMPI 3.1.3 and adding `--enable-static` didn't disable Slurm for me (I could use `srun` is all I specifically tested). According to https://github.com/open-mpi/ompi/issues/4338 this should be ok now. @ax3l
title: OpenMPI: adding static libraries with slurm support for latest versions.
